description: A blue-eyed Bavarian toddler buried 1,350 years ago was found with silk robes, a sword, silver ornaments, and a piglet. Dubbed the “Ice Prince”, the child was interred in a Roman-era villa. The wealth of grave goods and preservation of the tomb reveal rare insights into aristocratic life and early Christian burial rites in early medieval Bavaria.
title: 1,350-Year-Old Burial Reveals ‘Ice Prince’ Toddler Laid to Rest With Sword and Silk Robes

description: India is rolling out a new flagship EV policy in order to attract international automakers. The policy offers to slash duty to 15 percent on any imported electric car priced from $35,000 (roughly Rs. 30 lakh) if the maker invests at least Rs. 4,150 crore, or about $500 million (roughly Rs. 4,150 crore), to set up a local plant within three years.
title: Flagship India EV Policy Is a ‘Non-Starter’ for Global Firms

description: Tango Gameworks, the developer behind the acclaimed rhythm action title Hi-Fi Rush, has started early work on its next game. The studio confirmed Monday it was rebranding and hiring for a number of open positions for its unannounced action game.
title: Hi-Fi Rush Developer Tango Gameworks Announces Rebrand, Begins Hiring for New Action Game

description: ISRO conducted a successful third hot test of its SE2000 semi-cryogenic engine on May 28, 2025, at the ISRO Propulsion Complex in Mahendragiri. This final test in a three-phase series validated the start-up sequence of the engine, which uses liquid oxygen and kerosene in a staged combustion cycle. The SE2000 will power the upcoming SC120 stage of the LVM3, enhancing its payload capacity significantly. With subsystem validations complete, ISRO now moves toward full engine integration, aiming for a 2027 launch and expanding India's capabilities in space exploration and global launch services.
title: ISRO Successfully Tests SE2000 Engine for Next-Gen LVM3 Rocket Upgrade

description: ispace's Resilience lander is on the brink of touching down on the Moon’s Mare Frigoris region. If successful, this June 5 landing will mark a major milestone for Japan’s private space sector and the SMBC x HAKUTO-R Mission 2. The mission could mark a significant achievement for private space exploration in Japan.
title: Japan’s Resilience Lander to Touch Down on the Moon on June 5: What You Need to Know

description: Apple has reserved 120Hz screens, branded as ProMotion displays, on its iPhone Pro models since 2021. Though the Cupertino-based company used traditional 60Hz screens in the standard iPhone models. This year, the base iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Air are rumoured to feature ProMotion displays, but a new leak coming out of China states that only part of this information is accurate.
title: iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air to Debut Without ProMotion Display Features, Tipster Claims

description: OpenAI plans to build ChatGPT into a super-assistant that truly understands its user and their needs. The San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm’s vision for the first half of the ongoing year was recently revealed in an internal strategy document. The document shed light on the company’s larger vision around its chatbot and the features it plans to add to it eventually.
title: OpenAI Plans for All-Knowing ChatGPT Super Assistant Revealed in Internal Document

description: Written and directed by Manu Swaraj, Padakkalam is a complete entertainer that revolves around a group of friends whose lives have been turned upside down after knowing their professor does not seem what he actually is. The magical spree, swiped bodies, and a lot of comedy, Padakkalam is a must-watch. Streaming soon only on JioHotstar.
title: Padakkalam OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Malayalam Supernatural Comedy Online?

description: Character.AI unveiled several new multimodal artificial intelligence (AI) features on Monday. The California-based AI company said it is introducing new ways to let users interact and engage with the characters on the platform. Among them is a new image-to-video generation tool that will allow users to create videos of their characters.
title: Character.AI Unveils Video Generation Tool, Community Feed and Other Interactive Features

description: Elden Ring Nightreign has now sold over 3.5 million copies in just five days since it launched on May 30, developer FromSoftware confirmed Tuesday. The co-op action-survival title, which serves as a standalone multiplayer spinoff to Elden Ring, will also get a two-player mode in a future update, the Japenese studio confirmed.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Sells 3.5 Million Copies as FromSoftware Confirms Duos Mode Is on the Way

description: Lava is gearing up to expand its Storm 5G lineup of smartphones in India. The standard Lava Storm 5G version was unveiled in the country in December 2023 with a MediaTek Dimensity 6080 SoC. Now the company has revealed that it will launch the Lava Storm Play 5G and Storm Lite 5G handsets soon. Some key features and availability details of the upcoming smartphones have been teased as well.
title: Lava Storm Play 5G India Launch, Key Specifications Teased; Set to Debut Alongside Lava Storm Lite 5G

description: Nothing Phone 3 will launch globally soon. The brand has now finally confirmed the launch date of the phone. The company has started teasing several details about the upcoming handset. It is claimed to arrive as the first true flagship smartphone from the UK-based OEM.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Global Launch Date Set for July 1: Expected Specifications, Features

description: OnePlus Ace 6 and OnePlus Ace 6 Pro are expected to debut later this year. Leaked specifications suggest both phones will share key features, including a powerful Snapdragon 8 series chip and a 6.83-inch OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate. Both the OnePlus Ace 6 and OnePlus Ace 6 Pro are said to feature an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor.
title: OnePlus Ace 6, OnePlus Ace 6 Pro Tipped to Debut With Snapdragon 8 Series Chips

description: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Ultra is now available for a discounted price in India. The flagship was released in January this year with an initial price tag of Rs. 1,29,999. Now, Samsung is giving an instant cashback of Rs. 12,000 for the phone across all storage variants. There are additional exchange offers and no-cost EMI options.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Price in India Temporarily Cut by Rs. 12,000: Specifications, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 has surfaced on the WPC site with model number SM-D637U. The listing, first spotted by 9to5Google, shows support for Qi 2.1.0 with the Baseline Power Profile (BPP), not the full Magnetic Power Profile (MPP) standard. This indicates that the handset lacks built-in magnets for wireless charging or magnetic accessories.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Spotted on WPC Database With Qi 2 Charging Support Like the Galaxy S25 Series

description: Samsung was speculated to unveil the Galaxy Ring successor at the Galaxy Unpacked event in January alongside its flagship Galaxy S25 series handsets but that did not happen. Now, a report indicates that the development of the smart ring has commenced, due to which it could be introduced at a later date than previously anticipated. Thus, the purported Samsung Galaxy Ring 2, equipped with enhanced health-tracking features, may not come out this year.
title: Samsung Galaxy Ring 2 Reportedly in Development, but 2025 Launch Unlikely

description: Vivo Y19s Pro has been launched in select global markets. The 4G-supported smartphone comes with a Unisoc T612 chipset paired with up to 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage. It packs a 6,000mAh battery with support for 44W wired fast charging. The handset has an IP64 rating for dust and splash resistance, and is equipped with a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit.
title: Vivo Y19s Pro With 6,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera Launched: Price, Features

description: Apple is legally challenging an EU order requiring it to open its closed ecosystem to competitors like Meta. Apple said the EU's interoperability requirements create "a process that is unreasonable, costly, and stifles innovation".
title: Apple Challenges 'Unreasonable' EU Order to Open Up to Rivals

description: Coinbase said in the May SEC filing that it knew contractors accessed employee data "without business need" in "previous months." A May 14 SEC filing revealed that part of the breach involved an India-based employee of the US outsourcing firm TaskUs photographing her work computer with a personal phone.
title: Coinbase Breach Said to Be Linked to Customer Data Leak in India

description: Google plans to invest $500 million (roughly Rs. 4,273 crore) over a decade to improve its compliance system, resolving shareholder lawsuits over antitrust claims. Google denied wrongdoing in agreeing to settle.
title: Google to Spend $500 Million Revamping Compliance in Shareholder Settlement

description: Meta Platforms aims to allow brands to fully create and target advertisements with its AI tools by the end of 2026. The Mark Zuckerberg-led firm also plans to let advertisers personalise ads using AI, so that users see different versions of the same ad in real time, based on factors such as geolocation, according to a WSJ report.
title: Meta Said to Be Aiming to Fully Automate Advertising With AI by 2026

description: Microsoft cut hundreds more jobs just weeks after its largest layoff in years. The AI boom has roiled the tech labor market because companies are prioritising AI-focused jobs and harnessing the technology to save money.
title: Microsoft Cuts Hundreds More Jobs After Firing 6,000 Last Month

description: NxtQuantum is gearing up to introduce new AI+ branded smartphones in India. The upcoming lineup is said to be called the Nova 5G series, and it will likely include three handsets. A new report has shared an alleged live image of one of these anticipated models. The leaked handset reportedly carries the AI+ Nova 2 5G moniker, and the images show the design of the rear panel.
title: NxtQuantum's AI+ Nova 2 5G Alleged Live Images Surfaces Online; Shows Dual Rear Camer Unit

description: Redmi Pad 2 will launch later this week, the Chinese smartphone brand confirmed on Tuesday through its social media handles. The Xiaomi sub-brand has shared official images revealing the design and specifications of the new Android tablet. The Redmi Pad 2 is confirmed to come in at least two colourways with 4G connectivity. It is teased to ship with MediaTek Helio G100 Ultra chipset and an 11-inch screen with 2.5K resolution.
title: Redmi Pad 2 Launch Date Announced; Confirmed to Feature 9,000mAh Battery

description: Microsoft is rolling out noteworthy updates to Windows 10 and 11 for users in Europe, to comply with the EU's Digital Markets Act. The update disables prompts to set Microsoft Edge as the default browser and even lets users uninstall the Microsoft Store app, while still receiving application updates.
title: Microsoft Windows Users in Europe Can Now Uninstall Microsoft Store, Disable Microsoft Edge Default Prompts

description: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies is set to introduce the AI+ brand of smartphones in India soon. The handsets will be made in the country and will be available through Flipkart. The phones are said to use "homegrown user interface, localised software, and indigenously built hardware." The company says that the phones will arrive in the country by the end of this month, but an exact launch date has yet to be announced.
title: NxtQuantum to Launch AI+ Branded Phones in India By the End of June

description: Robinhood has officially acquired Luxembourg-headquartered crypto exchange Bitstamp. In an announcement posted on June 2, Robinhood revealed that it paid $200 million (roughly Rs. 1,709 crore) in cash to complete this acquisition.
title: Robinhood Acquires Bitstamp for $200 Million, Adds Over 50 Licences to Network

description: A new Dungeons & Dragons game is currently in development at Giant Skull, the new triple-A studio from Star Wars Jedi director Stig Asmussen. The game will be a single-player action-adventure title built for PC and consoles.
title: Star Wars Jedi Director's New Studio Giant Skull Working on Single-Player Dungeons & Dragons Game

description: WhatsApp is said to be working on a new functionality for its Android and iOS app that aims to make it easier to copy specific parts of a message in a chat window. As per a feature tracker, users may be able to highlight and extract specific words or sentences within a message. Spotted within a beta version of WhatsApp for both mobile platforms, it is speculated to eliminate the need of copying the entire text and then deleting the unnecessary parts.
title: WhatsApp for Android, iOS May Soon Let You Copy Specific Parts of a Message

description: Taiwan's TSMC said on Tuesday that US tariffs were having some impact on the company and had been discussed with Washington. TSMC's Chief Executive C.C. Wei has disclosed that the company had not seen any changes in customer behaviour due to tariff uncertainty.
title: TSMC Says US Tariffs Have Some Impact But AI Demand Robust

description: With WWDC 2025 on the horizon, rumours about the expected announcements are making the rounds. Ahead of the developer conference which kicks off on June 9, Apple has updated its homepage with a new tagline that supposedly teases the updates that will be previewed. The Cupertino-based tech giant is likely to announce the new firmware iterations for its devices such as the iPhone, iPad, and Mac, with all of them expected to undergo major visual refreshes this year.
title: Apple Teases Upcoming ‘Sleek Peek’ Updates Ahead of WWDC 2025 Next Week

description: Microsoft is adding a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature to its Bing mobile app. On Monday, the Redmond-based tech giant announced a new text-to-video generator tool dubbed Bing Video Creator, which is powered by OpenAI’s Sora. The company is offering the feature to all users for free, making it the first time that Sora’s video generation capability is available without cost.
title: Microsoft Bing Adds an AI Video Creator Tool Powered by OpenAI’s Sora

description: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies is set to introduce the AI+ brand of smartphones in India soon. The handsets will be made entirely in the country and will be available through Flipkart. The phones are said to use "homegrown user interface, localised software, and indigenously built hardware." Now the company has reportedly announced that the phones will be called AI+ Nova 5G series and confirmed it's launch date and few other details, including price range.
title: NxtQuantum's AI+ Phone to Launch in India on June 25, to Be Called Nova 5G Series: Report

description: Vivo has formally teased its upcoming foldable, the Vivo X Fold 5. A company executive in China has posted a video on the Chinese social media platform, hinting at the imminent arrival of the new foldable phone. The teaser video confirms that the Vivo X Fold 5 will be lighter than last year's X Fold 3. The Vivo X Fold 5 is expected to come with a 6,000mAh battery and could feature an 8.03-inch internal screen.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 Teaser Showcases Build; Will Be Thinner and Lighter than X Fold 3

description: Cooku with Comali Season 6 is a Tamil Reality cooking show which has now landed on your digital screens. The show is highly popular and is currently streaming on JioHotstar in Tamil language. Cooku with Comali follows the concept where celebrities and comedians are paired to win cooking challenges. The show is high on entertainment and is very popular with impressive IMDb rating.
title: Cooku with Comali Season 6 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G was launched in India on Tuesday. The handset sports a Cyber Mecha 2.0 design with customisable LED light panels at the back. It is backed by a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate SoC and a 5,500mAh battery with 45W wired and 30W wireless charging support. The GT 20 Pro 5G successor is a gaming-focused model like its predecessor and comes with shoulder triggers, XBoost Gaming Engine, and a six-layer 3D vapour cooling chamber.
title: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate SoC, Shoulder Triggers Launched in India

description: IO Interactive’s upcoming James Bond game finally has an official name after years of carrying around the Project 007 working title. The Hitman developer’s new game is called 007 First Light, and it is set for a full reveal later this week at the first-ever IOI Showcase.
title: IO Interactive's James Bond Game Is Called 007 First Light, Full Reveal Set for This Week

description: Realme C71 was launched in select markets as the latest addition to the company's affordable C series. The new Realme smartphone features a large 6,300mAh battery with support for 45W fast charging. It sports an AI-backed 50-megapixel rear camera and has a Unisoc T7250 chipset under the hood. The Realme C71 comes in two colourways with a 6.67-inch screen and 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Realme C71 With 6,300mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Qualcomm's Snapdragon X2 Elite chip, the anticipated successor to its first-generation Copilot+ PC processor, is reportedly in testing. WinFuture's Roland Quandt suggests the chipmaker is testing a memory configuration 64GB of RAM. The upcoming Snapdragon X2 Elite is also expected to arrive with 50 percent more CPU cores than the current Snapdragon X Elite chip, along with Qualcomm's next-gen Oryon V3 CPU cores.
title: Snapdragon X2 Elite Reportedly in Testing With 18 CPU Cores, 64GB of RAM

description: Based on the most disturbing scandal in the history of America’s Funeral Industry, The Mortician is a docuseries that is currently streaming on JioHotstar. It consists of three episodes and stars David Schone, the man behind the scandal. The series revolves around the story of a funeral home where heinous crimes were committed and the deceased were exploited to maximize profit.
title: The Mortician Now Available for Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know

description: WhatsApp for Android is said to be testing a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will allow users to create custom AI chatbots. As per a feature tracker, Meta is rolling out the feature to select beta testers, and more users might get access to it over the next few weeks.
title: WhatsApp for Android May Soon Let Users Create Custom AI Chatbots

description: Google Pixel 10 series could make its debut in August this year, according to a report. Although the Mountain View-based tech giant generally launches its flagship phones in October, it introduced the Pixel 9 phones earlier than usual last year, and now the Pixel 10 series could follow suit. Meanwhile, a prototype of one of the handsets in the lineup has allegedly surfaced on an instant messaging platform suggesting several of its key specifications.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series to Reportedly Launch on August 20; Prototype Surfaces Suggesting Key Specifications

description: Nothing Phone 3 is expected to make its debut in India and the global markets next month. Ahead of its anticipated launch, pricing and colourways of the upcoming handset have surfaced. While CEO Carl Pei had already teased the price range of the UK-based company’s “first true flagship phone”, we now have a clearer idea about the variant-based pricing. Alongside, Nothing may also expand its portfolio of audio products by introducing Nothing Headphone 1.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Price, Colour Options Tipped Ahead of Launch; Nothing Headphone 1 to Debut
